column4: anyone know how to find out if I have a  PPPoE Cable modem? I Dont think I do...
well then i cant find a guide on how to get my internet working
from what ive gathered from the wiki, i need PPPoE :P
i usually needed drivers to be installed to get on the internet
if i was to format my pc and put wxp back on
what kind of internet do you have
is it connected with an ethernet cable?
and do you have dhcp set up?
paste output of 'cat /etc/network/interfaces' in a pastebin
do you get an error with dhcp?
type 'sudo ifdown eth0 && sudo ifup eth0
see if you get an error
